title: Support for those with nasty, cruel, toxic, abusive MILs & moms - Reddit
body: About Community. A place to post about your MIL or Mother who is just the *worst*. Come for support, come for advice, or just to vent and get it all out. That's what we're here for. Discussion often contains adult themes and language. Created Feb 27, 2015. 1.9m.
readable_content:
- u/Jedi_Nixxee (2023-12-08): Oh boy…MIL showed up to bully us about Christmas.
  RANT (╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻ Ambivalent About Advice
  I (50f) got a text at about 10:45 AM that she was going to be here in little less than half an hour.
  ...
  I dodged the slap, stood up and I told her to get out of my house.

- u/echos_in_the_wood (2023-12-08): DH confronted MIL
  SUCCESS! ✌
  I did not go with him because I’m at the end of my rope with MIL and have been seriously cutting back on visits.
  ...I told DH that I am holding fast to my
